verses.verse: Then Eliashib <S%H475><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> with his brothers <S%H251><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> and they built <S%H1129><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%> gate; <S%H8179><s%> they sanctified <S%H6942><s%> it, <S%H5975><s%> and set up its doors; <S%H1817><s%> even to the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Hammeah <S%H3968><s%> they sanctified <S%H6942><s%> it, <S%H4026><s%> to the tower of Hananel. <S%H2606><s%>
Next to him <S%H3027><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%> Next to them built <S%H1129><s%> Zaccur <S%H2139><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Imri. <S%H566><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hassenaah <S%H5570><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> the fish <S%H1709><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%> They laid its beams, <S%H7136><s%> and set up <S%H5975><s%> its doors, <S%H1817><s%> its bolts, <S%H4514><s%> and its bars. <S%H1280><s%>

Next to them, <S%H3027><s%> Meremoth <S%H4822><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uriah, <S%H223><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hakkoz <S%H6976><s%> made repairs. <S%H2388><s%> Next to them, <S%H3027><s%> Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah, <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshezabel <S%H4898><s%> made repairs. <S%H2388><s%> Next to them, <S%H3027><s%> Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baana <S%H1195><s%> made repairs. <S%H2388><s%>

Next to them, <S%H3027><s%> the Tekoites <S%H8621><s%> made repairs; <S%H2388><s%> but their nobles <S%H117><s%> didn't <S%H935><s%> put their necks <S%H6677><s%> to the work <S%H5656><s%> of their lord. <S%H113><s%>

Joiada <S%H3111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Paseah <S%H6454><s%> and Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Besodeiah <S%H1152><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> the old <S%H3465><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%> They laid its beams, <S%H7136><s%> and set up <S%H5975><s%> its doors, <S%H1817><s%> and its bolts, <S%H4514><s%> and its bars. <S%H1280><s%>

Next to them, <S%H3027><s%> Melatiah <S%H4424><s%> the Gibeonite, <S%H1393><s%> and Jadon <S%H3036><s%> the Meronothite, <S%H4824><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> and of Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> the residence <S%H3678><s%> of the governor <S%H6346><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the River. <S%H5104><s%>

Next to him, <S%H3027><s%> Uzziel <S%H5816><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Harhaiah, <S%H2736><s%> goldsmiths, <S%H6884><s%> made repairs. <S%H2388><s%> Next to him, <S%H3027><s%> Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> one <S%H1121><s%> of the perfumers <S%H7546><s%> made repairs, <S%H2388><s%> and they fortified <S%H5800><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> even to the broad <S%H7342><s%> wall. <S%H2346><s%>

Next to them, <S%H3027><s%> Rephaiah <S%H7509><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur, <S%H2354><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of half <S%H2677><s%> the district <S%H6418><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> made repairs. <S%H2388><s%>

Next to them, <S%H3027><s%> Jedaiah <S%H3042><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Harumaph <S%H2739><s%> made repairs <S%H2388><s%> across from his house. <S%H1004><s%> Next to him, <S%H3027><s%> Hattush <S%H2407><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashabneiah <S%H2813><s%> made repairs. <S%H2388><s%>

Malchijah <S%H4441><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Harim, <S%H2766><s%> and Hasshub <S%H2815><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pahathmoab, <S%H6355><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> portion, <S%H4060><s%> and the tower <S%H4026><s%> of the furnaces. <S%H8574><s%>

Next to him, <S%H3027><s%> Shallum <S%H7967><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hallohesh, <S%H3873><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of half <S%H2677><s%> the district <S%H6418><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> he and his daughters, <S%H1323><s%> made repairs. <S%H2388><s%>

Hanun <S%H2586><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Zanoah <S%H2182><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> the valley <S%H1516><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%> They built <S%H1129><s%> it, <S%H5975><s%> and set up its doors, <S%H1817><s%> its bolts, <S%H4514><s%> and its bars, <S%H1280><s%> and one thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> of the wall <S%H2346><s%> to the dung <S%H830><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%>

Malchijah <S%H4441><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Rechab, <S%H7394><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the district <S%H6418><s%> of Beth Haccherem <S%H1021><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> the dung <S%H830><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%> He built <S%H1129><s%> it, <S%H5975><s%> and set up its doors, <S%H1817><s%> its bolts, <S%H4514><s%> and its bars. <S%H1280><s%>

Shallun <S%H7968><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Colhozeh, <S%H3626><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the district <S%H6418><s%> of Mizpah <S%H4709><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> the spring <S%H5869><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%> He built <S%H1129><s%> it, <S%H2926><s%> and covered it, <S%H5975><s%> and set up its doors, <S%H1817><s%> its bolts, <S%H4514><s%> and its bars, <S%H1280><s%> and the wall <S%H2346><s%> of the pool <S%H1295><s%> of Shelah <S%H7975><s%> by the king <S%H4428><s%>'s garden, <S%H1588><s%> even to the stairs <S%H4609><s%> that go down <S%H3381><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H5166><s%> Nehemiah the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azbuk, <S%H5802><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of half <S%H2677><s%> the district <S%H6418><s%> of Beth Zur, <S%H1049><s%> made repairs <S%H2388><s%> to the place opposite the tombs <S%H6913><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> and to the pool <S%H1295><s%> that was made, <S%H6213><s%> and to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the mighty men. <S%H1368><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H3881><s%> the Levites, Rehum <S%H7348><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bani <S%H1137><s%> made repairs. <S%H2388><s%> Next to him, <S%H3027><s%> Hashabiah, <S%H2811><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of half <S%H2677><s%> the district <S%H6418><s%> of Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> made repairs <S%H2388><s%> for his district. <S%H6418><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H251><s%> their brothers, Bavvai <S%H942><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Henadad, <S%H2582><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of half <S%H2677><s%> the district <S%H6418><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%> made repairs. <S%H2388><s%>

Next to him, <S%H3027><s%> Ezer <S%H5829><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua, <S%H3442><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> portion, <S%H4060><s%> across from the ascent <S%H5927><s%> to the armory <S%H5402><s%> at the turning of the wall. <S%H4740><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H1263><s%> Baruch the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zabbai <S%H2079><s%> earnestly <S%H2734><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> portion, <S%H4060><s%> from the turning <S%H4740><s%> of the wall to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Eliashib <S%H475><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest. <S%H3548><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H4822><s%> Meremoth the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uriah <S%H223><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hakkoz <S%H6976><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> portion, <S%H4060><s%> from the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Eliashib <S%H475><s%> even to the end <S%H8503><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Eliashib. <S%H475><s%>
After <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H3548><s%> the priests, the men <S%H582><s%> of the Plain <S%H3603><s%> made repairs. <S%H2388><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> them, <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin and Hasshub <S%H2815><s%> made repairs <S%H2388><s%> across from their house. <S%H1004><s%> After <S%H310><s%> them, <S%H5838><s%> Azariah the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ananiah <S%H6055><s%> made repairs <S%H2388><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> his own house. <S%H1004><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H1131><s%> Binnui the son <S%H1121><s%> of Henadad <S%H2582><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> portion, <S%H4060><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Azariah <S%H5838><s%> to the turning <S%H4740><s%> of the wall, <S%H6438><s%> and to the corner.

Palal <S%H6420><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzai <S%H186><s%> made repairs opposite the turning <S%H4740><s%> of the wall, <S%H4026><s%> and the tower that stands out <S%H3318><s%> from the upper <S%H5945><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of the king, <S%H4428><s%> which is by the court <S%H2691><s%> of the guard. <S%H4307><s%> After <S%H310><s%> him Pedaiah <S%H6305><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Parosh made repairs. <S%H6551><s%>

(Now the Nethinim <S%H5411><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Ophel, <S%H6077><s%> to the place over against the water <S%H4325><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> toward the east, <S%H4217><s%> and the tower <S%H4026><s%> that stands out. <S%H3318><s%>)

After <S%H310><s%> him the Tekoites <S%H8621><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> portion, <S%H4060><s%> over against the great <S%H1419><s%> tower <S%H4026><s%> that stands out, <S%H3318><s%> and to the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Ophel. <S%H6077><s%>
Above the horse <S%H5483><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> made repairs, <S%H2388><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> across <S%H5048><s%> from his own house. <S%H1004><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> them, <S%H6659><s%> Zadok the son <S%H1121><s%> of Immer <S%H564><s%> made repairs <S%H2388><s%> across from his own house. <S%H1004><s%> After <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H8098><s%> Shemaiah the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shecaniah, <S%H7935><s%> the keeper <S%H8104><s%> of the east <S%H4217><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> made repairs. <S%H2388><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H2608><s%> Hananiah the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shelemiah, <S%H8018><s%> and Hanun <S%H2586><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Zalaph, <S%H6764><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> portion. <S%H4060><s%> After <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H4918><s%> Meshullam the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah <S%H1296><s%> made repairs <S%H2388><s%> across from his room. <S%H5393><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H4441><s%> Malchijah one <S%H1121><s%> of the goldsmiths <S%H6885><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Nethinim, <S%H5411><s%> and of the merchants, <S%H7402><s%> made repairs <S%H2388><s%> over against the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Hammiphkad, <S%H4663><s%> and to the ascent <S%H5944><s%> of the corner. <S%H6438><s%>
Between the ascent <S%H5944><s%> of the corner <S%H6438><s%> and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> the goldsmiths <S%H6884><s%> and the merchants <S%H7402><s%> made repairs. <S%H2388><s%>
